api_name: Salesforce Platform APIs: OAuth Usage
functionality: Lists all the external client apps for the current org. See [OAuth Usage](https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.246.0.chatterapi.meta/chatterapi/connect_resources_usage.htm).

api_name: Salesforce Platform APIs: OAuth App Users
functionality: Lists all users for the external client app indicated by the app ID. See [OAuth Users by App ID](https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.246.0.chatterapi.meta/chatterapi/connect_resources_usage_app_id_users.htm).

api_name: Salesforce Platform APIs: OAuth App Users Tokens
functionality: Lists all tokens for a user of the external client app. See [Refresh Token by User and App](https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.246.0.chatterapi.meta/chatterapi/connect_resources_usage_app_id_user_id_tokens.htm).

api_name: Salesforce Platform APIs: OAuth User Tokens Revoke
functionality: Revokes all tokens for a user of the external client app. See [Refresh Token by User and App](https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.246.0.chatterapi.meta/chatterapi/connect_resources_usage_app_id_user_id_tokens.htm).

api_name: Salesforce Platform APIs: OAuth Tokens Revoke
functionality: Revokes all tokens available for the external client app. See [Refresh Token by App ID](https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.246.0.chatterapi.meta/chatterapi/connect_resources_usage_app_id_tokens.htm).

api_name: Salesforce Platform APIs: OAuth Token Revoke
functionality: Revokes one token. See [OAuth Refresh Token](https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.246.0.chatterapi.meta/chatterapi/connect_resources_usage_tokens_token_id.htm).

api_name: Salesforce Platform APIs: Update Table

body.raw:
{
   "setupName":"Product Qualificiation eligibility",
   "fullName":"ProductQualificationEligibility",
   "description":"Eligiblity of Products using Qualification Rules",
   "usageType":"ProductEligibility",
   "sourceType":"SingleSobject",
   "sourceObject":"AccountFeed",
   "status":"Draft",
   "decisionResultPolicy":"UniqueValues",
   "collectOperator":"Count",
   "conditionType":"Any",
   "conditionCriteria":"1 OR 2 OR 3",
   "parameters":[
      {
         "fieldName":"IsDeleted",
         "usage":"INPUT",
         "operator":"Equals",
         "sequence":"1"
      },
      {
         "fieldName":"Id",
         "usage":"INPUT",
         "operator":"Equals",
         "sequence":"2"
      },
      {
         "fieldName":"Title",
         "usage":"INPUT",
         "operator":"Equals",
         "sequence":"3"
      },
      {
         "fieldName":"CreatedById",
         "usage":"OUTPUT"
      }
   ]
}
